name: National Health Investors, Inc.
description: National Health Investors, Inc. (NHI) is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that specializes in the healthcare sector. Established in 1991 and headquartered in Murfreesboro, Tennessee, NHI focuses on investing in income-producing healthcare properties, primarily senior housing and medical facilities. The company aims to provide a reliable source of income for its shareholders by acquiring and managing properties that support the growing demand for senior care and healthcare services. NHI’s portfolio includes a mix of assisted living facilities, skilled nursing facilities, and independent living communities, strategically located across the United States. With a commitment to high-quality healthcare services, NHI partners with experienced operators to ensure the effective management and operation of its properties. The company also emphasizes sustainability and operational excellence in its investments, making it a significant player in the healthcare real estate market. NHI is dedicated to enhancing the quality of life for seniors and promoting health and wellness through its investments, which aligns with the broader trend of an aging population and the increasing need for healthcare resources. As a publicly traded company, NHI is committed to transparency and strong corporate governance, ensuring that it meets the expectations of its investors and stakeholders alike.
